data.actual_result: The sensitivity doesen't change when clicking, it goes back
data.expected_result: The sensitivity should change when clicked
data.short_description: Manual Input Sensitivity is glitching when clicking on it
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a Voice Channel - Go to User Settings - Go to Voice and Video - Click on Voice Activity - Click on automaticly determine input sensitivity - Click on the green/yellow part of the indicator
